```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tigerData)
library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
traingirl <- subset(reviews, book == "traingirl")

traingirl$content[10]
```

```{r}
linkPattern <- "(?<=<a class=\"\"a-link-normal\"\" href=\"\"/)(.+?)(?=\"\">)"

traingirlLinks <-
  traingirl %>% 
  mutate(linkCount = str_count(content, linkPattern))

traingirlLinks %>% 
  group_by(linkCount) %>% 
  summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  knitr::kable(caption=str_c("Table showing number of links made by reviewers about the Girl on a Train."))
```

```{r}
traingirlLinks %>% 
  filter(linkCount == max(linkCount)) %>%
  .$content %>%
  str_extract_all(pattern = linkPattern) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  str_c("http://www.amazon.com/", .)
```
